title: OPL Split 2 Week 5 Tipping
body:
Hey everyone!

http://i.imgur.com/Y3WUesP.jpg

Split 2 Week 5 of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is up next!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 22nd of June.

[Click here](http://goo.gl/forms/EvYXXlWr9B) to go to the tipping form

This week anyone that can pick **8 matches** correctly will get the **250 RP!** 

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Monday 22nd of June at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with which match up you think will be the hardest to call and why!

replies.body: The tipping form seems still remain open at the time of post.

Hey Kenjishin,

Looks like we left that one open past the time, luckily every entry has time stamps so we will only count those that submitted before 5:30 pm AEDT on the 22nd of June.

Thanks for the heads up though!

You are most welcome, thanks for your hard effort to set up this tipping every week.

keep the community involving in the social weekly event.
